fun.connor.lighter.compiler.generator.codegen

Class SimpleField

  • java.lang.Object
    • fun.connor.lighter.compiler.generator.codegen.SimpleField
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Assignable, Expression, Field, Statement, TypedElement

    public class SimpleField
extends java.lang.Object
implements Field, Expression, Assignable
    Implementation of Field which can represent a mutable class field. This field is both an Assignable and an Expression.
